target_sources(GLPK
  PRIVATE
    alloc.c
    dlsup.c
    env.c
    env.h
    error.c
    stdc.c
    stdc.h
    stdout.c
    stream.c
    time.c
    tls.c
)

target_sources(GLPSOL
    PRIVATE
        alloc.c
        dlsup.c
        env.c
        env.h
        error.c
        stdc.c
        stdc.h
        stdout.c
        stream.c
        time.c
        tls.c
)
